attributes.action: I agree with the Prime Minister on Proroguing Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament rejected a good deal three times put forward by Mrs May and the Speaker of the house has continually tried to perverse the course of Brexit.  This is the only way we can leave now a last chance.
attributes.background: I think that this is the only way now to achieve democracy and leave the EU as Parliament has frustrated all attempts over the last three years that have been put forward to enable the UK to leave with a deal.
